Package model

Class PlayerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.PlayerBoard
  • public class PlayerBoard
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PlayerBoard()
      constructor method, It has no parameters, creates a board with a default loader, a damagePoints list and marks list empity (because no one still hit the player) and a default list for kill points

        public int getNumDamagePoints​(Player p)

        Returns:

      • calculateDamage

        public void calculateDamage​(DamageTransporter d)
        This method applies all the changes to the player board given a damageTransporter object. If the damage of the transporter is greater than0, all the old marks are converted to damage. then all the damage is added to the damagePoints list and then all the new marks are added to the marks list.
        Parameters:
        d - contains all the information that regards the damage. It's supposed to be legal
